name: The Extinction
description: The Empire is falling. We're lacking in resources and our worlds are overpopulated. Civil war may break out anytime. You have been chosen to explore the unknown worlds and colonize them in order to protect our people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
